Note: For the usual version see 5672 and 6047.
_description: Gospel for Second Sunday in Advent in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint luke witnes vntil vsIn þis godspel þat ihesus…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Þus warnes vs oure lorde mightyffor þat we sal be ay redy
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Erunt signa in sole & luna & stellis et in terris pressura gentium.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica secunda aduentus domini secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 3va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.159-161.
